action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow guard's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). The drow guard can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow guard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow guard to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow guard has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
